text: Salvatore Corallo (11 October 1928 – 4 May 2019) was an Italian politician. He was a member of the Communist Party (PCI). He became a member of the Sicilian Regional Assembly in 1959. He served as President of Sicily from June to September 1961. He later served as a member of the Chamber of Deputies from 1976 to 1979, and as a Senator from 1979 to 1983. He was born in Syracuse, Sicily. Corallo died on 4 May 2019 in Syracuse, at the age of 90. ==References== ==Other websites== * Salvatore Corallo – Chamber of Deputies profile Category:1928 births Category:2019 deaths Category:Italian communist politicians Category:Politicians from Sicily
title: Salvatore Corallo
